boardgame.description: Game description from the publisher:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Gear up for a thrilling adventure to recover a legendary flying machine buried deep in the ruins of an ancient desert city. You'll need to coordinate with your teammates and use every available resource if you hope to survive the scorching heat and relentless sandstorm. Find the flying machine and escape before you all become permanent artifacts of the forbidden desert!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In Forbidden Desert, a thematic sequel to Forbidden Island, players take on the roles of brave adventurers who must throw caution to the wind and survive both blistering heat and blustering sand in order to recover a legendary flying machine buried under an ancient desert city. While featuring cooperative gameplay similar to Forbidden Island, Forbidden Desert is a fresh, new game based around an innovative set of mechanisms such as an ever-shifting board, individual resource management, and a unique method for locating the flying machine parts._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Private listing for herendil66.

Gamewright (GMW415) When we launched Forbidden Island in 2010, we had an inkling that we had created a hit game but never to the point that we_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d be prompted to make a sequel. Well, here we are a few years later with just that in hand. Our challenge to designer Matt Leacock was to create a game that would contain familiar elements (cooperative play, modular board), while offering up a completely different in-game experience. In addition, we wanted it to be simultaneously approachable to new players while upping the ante for those who felt they had mastered Forbidden Island. All this resulted in a fresh new game with an innovative set of mechanics, such as an ever-shifting board, individual resource management, and unique method for locating the flying machine parts. Hopefully we_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve achieved our goals and quenched your thirst for adventure!

Our challenge to designer Matt Leacock was to create a game that would contain familiar elements (cooperative play, modular board), while offering up a completely different in-game experience. In addition, we wanted it to be simultaneously approachable to new players while upping the ante for those who felt they had mastered Forbidden Island. All this resulted in a fresh new game with an innovative set of mechanics, such as an ever-shifting board, individual resource management, and unique method for locating the flying machine parts. Hopefully we_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve achieved our goals and quenched your thirst for adventure!

Forbidden Desert: £13.99 This is a brand new, shrink wrapped copy of the game. --Postage (UK _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Europe)-- -UK Shipping: £4 -Europe, please contact me for details Parcels are sent using MyHermes (though I reserve the right to change couriers at any time). This item is tracked and insured to the value of £20. If additional insurance is required please contact me to arrange (Buyer pays additional cost). I aim to dispatch all items within 72hrs of receiving payment and delivery normally takes 3-5 working days. If multiple items are bought I will combine shipping, please contact me to arrange this. I recycle packaging wherever possible to keep shipping costs as low as I am able. --Collection-- Your item can be collected from my store in Berkshire (RG45 7AD). Please contact info@thegameshunter.co.uk to arrange. Selecting this option will avoid any shipping costs. I also attend games nights in Reading and Wokingham and can bring these with me. Again this avoids shipping costs, contact me to arrange. --Returns-- If you are unhappy with the product, please contact info@thegameshunter.co.uk within 7 working days and we will attempt to resolve the matter. Unopened copies of the game that are no longer wanted can be returned, but there is a 10% restocking fee payable of the item price and the Buyer is responsible for the return shipping costs. --Multiple Purchase Discounts-- I am happy to offer discounts if multiple marketplace purchases are made. Please e-mail beforehand to discuss.
